mapper.sql:
select * from qna inner join member on qna.mem_no = member.mem_no
qna_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
qna_content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
mem_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
mapper.insert: /* qnaInsert */ insert into qna (qna_no, qna_writedate, qna_title, qna_content, qna_category, qna_file1, qna_modifydate, mem_no) values (qna_seq.nextval, sysdate, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, #{qna_category}, #{qna_file1}, sysdate, #{mem_no} )
mapper.update: /* qnaHit */ update qna set qna_hit = qna_hit +1 where qna_no = #{qna_no}
mapper.select: /* qnaDetail */ select * from qna inner join member on qna.mem_no = member.mem_no left outer join prd_detail on qna.prd_d_no = prd_detail.prd_d_no left outer join prd_master on prd_detail.prd_no = prd_master.prd_no where qna.qna_no = #{qna_no}
mapper.delete: /* qnaDelete */ delete from qna where qna_no = #{qna_no}
